rows.label: qst701503_msg0001
rows.name:
My, my, you'll share the
materials? Thank you so much.
Now I can finally finish it.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0002
rows.name:
Are you okay? Is there anything
else we can help with?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0003
rows.name:
No, young lady. Your
kindness is enough.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0004
rows.name:
If I don't, I won't
be able to face him.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0005
rows.name:
It's rude of me to ask something
so personal, but who is "him"?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0006
rows.name:
He was my husband. Though we
haven't met for decades.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0007
rows.name: That's quite...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0008
rows.name:
Back then, he suddenly had to take
over the family business and told
me to help him at the shop.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0009
rows.name:
I had just become a potter, which
was my dream, and I was furious...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0010
rows.name:
I told him I would return when I had
created my greatest work, so I would
have no regrets, and I left him.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0011
rows.name:
...And that was it? Your
husband didn't come for you?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0012
rows.name:
He probably knew. That the
work was just an excuse.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0013
rows.name:
I could have done as he said. But I
was young, so selfish. I was angry at
him for not looking at me... fufu.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0014
rows.name:
I couldn't forgive him because I loved him.
It took me a long time to admit that, and
by the time I did, I had lost his love.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm sorry for talking so long.
It's been a while since I've
talked to someone like this.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0017
rows.name:
When the vase is finished, could
you deliver it to him? Tell him
it's the work that Mirei promised.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0018
rows.name: Sorry, but I can't grant that request.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0019
rows.name: Hey, Minochi?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0020
rows.name:
You made a promise, didn't you? Why
don't you deliver it yourself?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0021
rows.name: At this point...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0022
rows.name:
Don't talk about it in the past tense.
Your present is still ongoing.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0023
rows.name:
If you have time to be
self-contained, talk it out.
Before it's truly too late.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0024
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Minochi... He's still worried
about Deacon Marveni...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0025
rows.name:
Laura and Adel here
are hopelessly kind.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0026
rows.name:
Since they've been asked, they'll
probably help with all their might
until the grand finale. You're lucky.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0027
rows.name:
...Fufu, I understand. I should
move my body a little, or the
end will come sooner.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0028
rows.name:
Could you wait a moment?
I'll get ready right away.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0029
rows.name:
I'm sorry to have kept
you waiting. Please let
me accompany you to him.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0030
rows.name:
Are you really okay? You
shouldn't push yourself.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0031
rows.name:
It's the inn in Hyber Village,
so it's not that far. I'll
be fine with all of you.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0032
rows.name:
Hyber Village? ...Then
that husband of yours is!

rows.label: qst701503_msg0033
rows.name:
Fufu, it's been since the day we
parted that I've visited that place.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0034
rows.name:
I might show you an unsightly
side of me, but please, I'm
counting on you during the journey.
